title: Valve Sent Me The NEW Steam Deck OLED!!
description:
I know I'm late to the party and everybody has there initial videos out already, blame Fedex but we're here anyway I finally have my hands on the Steam Deck OLED and today we're looking at the device for what it is, later on we'll be talking about my experience using it
